name: Easy Vegetable Soup
author: Anonymous
summary: Reach for Swanson® Beef Broth to make this comforting and delicious soup packed with carrots, green beans, and potatoes, and seasoned with onion, garlic and thyme.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon dried thyme leaves, crushed
3 ½ (14 ounce) cans Swanson® Beef Broth (Regular, 50% Less Sodium or Certified Organic)
1 cup fresh or frozen cut green beans
directions: Heat the oil in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat
Add the onion, garlic, parsley and thyme and cook until the onion is tender-crisp
Add the carrots, potato and beans to the saucepan and heat to a boil
Cover and cook for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are tender
